research_intro.title: University of Washington Social Media for Youth Research
research_intro.description_before_bold: The current version of the app is still in beta and is
research_intro.description_bold: only available to participants in our research study
research_intro.description_after_bold: . If you're interested, please use the links below to sign up or log in.
research_intro.has_account: I already signed up and received my account information.
research_intro.has_not_account: Great, I'd like to sign up for the study
research_intro.someting_else_description: If you signed up for the study but haven't received your account information yet, please allow a couple of days for us to get back to you. If you still don't hear from us, feel free to reach out via:

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.description: We'll email you password reset instructions.
forgot_password.email_guide: Enter the email address you used to register.

sign_up.email_guide: You will need to verify your email later.
sign_up.password_constraints: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
sign_up.research_desc: <0>WhoAmI Today is a non-profit service developed by a group of researchers at the University of Washington to make social media more aligned with the needs of adolescents. If you agree to the<1>privacy policy/consent form</1>, you agree to participating in our research, which includes the (aggregated and deidentified) analysis of your data.</0>
sign_up.agree_to_research: Agree (optional, unless you are currently participating in the research led by Univ. of Washington research team).
sign_up.i_agree_to_provide_consent_to_my_child's: I agree to provide consent to my child's participation in the research.
sign_up.printing_your_name_below: Printing your name below will act as a signature to consent to the information above.
sign_up.data_security_guide: The data we collect will be confidential and will not be stored with your name. All data and audio and recordings will be stored securely.
sign_up.noti_time_setting_desc_1: We'll send out daily reminders to post.
sign_up.noti_time_setting_desc_2: When do you want to be notified?
sign_up.error: A temporary error occurred. Please try again.
